io.sphere.sdk.commands

Interface Command<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result of the command
    All Superinterfaces:
    SphereRequest<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateCommand<T>, CustomerCreateCommand, CustomObjectDeleteCommand<T>, CustomObjectUpsertCommand<T>, DeleteCommand<T>, DraftBasedCreateCommand<T,D>, DraftBasedCreateCommandDsl<T,D,C>, OrderFromCartCreateCommand, ProductCreateCommand, ProductUpdateCommand, ProjectUpdateCommand, UpdateCommand<T>, UpdateCommandDsl<T,C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandImpl, CreateCommandImpl, CustomerChangePasswordCommand, CustomerCreateEmailTokenCommand, CustomerCreatePasswordTokenCommand, CustomerPasswordResetCommand, CustomerSignInCommand, CustomerVerifyEmailCommand, CustomObjectCustomJsonMappingUpsertCommand, MetaModelByIdDeleteCommandImpl, MetaModelCreateCommandImpl, MetaModelUpdateCommandDslImpl, OrderImportCommand, ProductImageUploadCommand

    public interface Command<T>
extends SphereRequest<T>
    A command represents a request to update the state of platform entities.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest

        canDeserialize, deserialize, httpRequestIntent
